Articles.Content: So the website is down, anyone think it might be 0.21 incoming?

Sorry to burst your bubble, but:

warning Store outage Status: Resolved

01:36 AM CDT Store, wiki, and update service are offline. Preliminary investigation reveals that lighttpd has been updated again.

01:49 AM CDT Services are back online. We had an exclude clause configured for lighttpd so that the server wouldn't try to update it, but apparently it got removed. The only program that edits that file is cPanel, so I'm now going to go try and teach cPanel a lesson.

http://status.kerbalspaceprogram.com/ for my source

Again? We had this discussion last night, right here.

Harv even replied to say the server was simply down:

It's nothing to get excited about I'm afraid... The server simply seems to be down.

We're scrambling to fix it and will resume normality as soon as possible.

Cheers

It's 3am in Mexico right now, and I can confirm you that an update won't be uploaded at 3am. Anyway, experimentals has only been going on for two full days, that's far from being enough to squash the bugs in a new release. With the new terrain on the Mun, and the new ASAS, it's likely it will be a bit longer. So yeah, no update sadly.

tl;dr: server is down, go home everyone.

EDIT: btw, those server updates were those of last night. They always get posted after, I don't know why. Maybe when N3X15 is awake. We'll see later on today that the site was down at 4am.
weird. Website is down for me but status.kerbalspaceprogram.com says that it is not. Weird.

weird. Website is down for me but status.kerbalspaceprogram.com says that it is not. Weird.

It didn't the other day neither. Actually, all of the times a site was down, it didn't show up on the server website when I looked excepted for planned updates and such. It's not being updated live with the server status I fear.

It didn't the other day neither. Actually, all of the times a site was down, it didn't show up on the server website when I looked excepted for planned updates and such. It's not being updated live with the server status I fear.

Oh, I thought the status server was all about live updating! So basically the server is just a calendar with manually server downage written on it?
Given the announcement of the last phase, I wouldn't expect the update any sooner than next Thursday.
I hate posts like this. Stop assuming, it was a woefully tenuous link anyway. Don't say its inbound when your just guessing.

That's hardly a sign of an impending release; it just means that the website currently isn't working. We may still wave to wait for a little while, considering that the experimental phase began only two days ago and that today is Friday.

Edited July 12, 2013 by Felsmak

Oh, I thought the status server was all about live updating! So basically the server is just a calendar with manually server downage written on it?

Well, when there's planned updates it shows you, but if the server goes down, I don't think it puts the notification live, it might be updated every hour or so, I don't know.
I personally think that it will be out 'till the next week,but jeeez.I'm going to vacation today
